text: This conversation has not been started with a specific text to summarize.    162→    response_model=Dict[str, Any],

   164→async def root():
   165→    """
   166→    ## API Root Endpoint
   167→
   168→    Returns basic API information including version, documentation links, and available endpoints.
   169→
   170→    **Use this endpoint to:**

   174→    """

   179→        "docs": {
   180→            "swagger": "http://100.110.82.181:8001/docs",
   181→            "redoc": "http://100.110.82.181:8001/redoc"
   182→        },
   183→        "endpoints": {
   184→            "health": "/health",
   185→            "query_memories": "/memories/query",
   186→            "get_memory": "/memories/{memory_id}",
   187→            "list_namespaces": "/namespaces",
   188→            "memory_count": "/memories/count",
   189→            "upload_transcript": "/transcripts/upload",
   190→            "pipeline_status": "/pipeline/status"
   191→        }
   192→    }
   193→
   194→@app.get("/health",
   195→    summary="Health Check",
   196→    description="Check API and database health",
   197→    response_model=HealthResponse,
   198→    tags=["Monitoring"])
   199→async def health_check():
   200→    """
   201→    ## Health Check Endpoint
   202→
   203→    Returns comprehensive health status including:
   204→    - API operational status
   205→    - Database connectivity
   206→    - Pipeline services status
   207→
   208→    **Use this for:**
   209→    - Monitoring/alerting systems
   210→    - Load balancer health checks
   211→    - Debugging connectivity issues
   212→    """
   213→    import subprocess
   214→
   215→    def check_process(name):
   216→        try:
   217→            result = subprocess.run(['pgrep', '-f', name], capture_output=True)
   218→            return result.returncode == 0
   219→        except:
   220→            return False
   221→
   222→    # Test database connection
   223→    db_healthy = False
   224→    try:
   225→        conn = get_db_connection()
   226→        conn.close()
   227→        db_healthy = True
   228→    except:
   229→        pass
   230→
   231→    return HealthResponse(
   232→        status="healthy" if db_healthy else "degraded",
   233→        timestamp=datetime.now().isoformat(),
   234→        database=db_healthy,
   235→        services={
   236→            "server_scripty": check_process("server-scripty.py"),
   237→            "swarm_intake": check_process("swarm_intake_processor.py"),
   238→            "pgai_queue": check_process("pgai_queue_ingestor.py")
   239→        }
   240→    )
   241→
   242→@app.get("/pipeline/status", response_model=PipelineStatus)
   243→async def get_pipeline_status():
   244→    """Get pipeline status - check if all services are running"""'}]
